answers.answer: In most states it's required by law... But why wouldn't you take the glucose test you need to know if you have gestational diabetes so it can be monitored and keep your baby safe
I choose to take it, because i didnt want to risk having GD. Yeah it tastes like liquid as$ but it isnt painful haha. Its quick as well.
People always comment on how bad it tastes but mine tasted like orange popsicle in a bottle. It wasn't bad at all just sugary.
I did it. I hate needles but it wasnt too bad. Tasted like super sweet flat lemonade.

question: Did anyone else refuse the glucosKe test?!??
title: did anyone else?!
